profiletxt: I'm a dedicated Computer Science student at ITU with hands-on experience in software development and leadership roles. I have worked on various projects and continue to explore new learning opportunities.

projects.name: 1 week STEM workshop
projects.description: Training students to use Arduino to make projects

projects.name: UAV drone
projects.description: With a group of 6 fellow members, made a UAV drone model that can fly, and capture video. Using integrated AI system, detects faulty crops and reports to database

experience.name: Teaching Assistant- Discrete Structures
experience.description: I am working with Dr. Mudassir Shabbir as TA for batch 2024. My key responsibilities include monitoring class, checking class activities, delivering a help session for students once every week

experience.name: Friends Of Corner- Internship
experience.description: Recently started an internship with lincoln corners. I organise amd manage evemnts at the space like Summer STEM workshop

experience.name: HR Manager- Internship(Affiliate Program)
experience.description: As a manager, I interview and hire teachers and make their tachong profiles online. Then I personally train teachers with how to teach sucessfully online.

experience.name: 6 Week Summer Program- Internship
experience.description: As intern, spend a week in every department HR, Admin, Operations, Kitchen & Procurement Management, Customer Representative.

awards.name: The Monal Group
awards.description: I completed a 4-Week intense internship program at The Monal Group, where I was introduced to all departments of a basic (Restaurant) Business: HR,Admin,Kitchen,Operations,Customer Service, Database SYstems. The intense program familiarised me to how to lead an organisation, manage employees and handle day-to-day problems and activities.

awards.name: IEEE Society
awards.description: As a member of the IEEE Society, I worked as a Graphic Designer, making 2/3 posts a week as well as having the opportunity to attend the society events and competitions. It was a good learning journey!
